article_title: The Healthcare.gov Debacle Will Make The Feds More Powerful

article_metadata.author: Todd Hixon

og.description: The implementation of healthcare.gov has flopped spectacularly. And, the White House shot its other foot when it told 5 million Americans that they can keep their individual policies when they can’t, and many knew they could not. What does this mean for the ACA and the role of the federal government in healthcare? Ironically, it will only make them more powerful.
